channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Charles Burnett’s California Before the Fall
item.description: A film record of the Golden State’s ongoing catastrophe.

item.title: U.K.: Don’t You Dare Criticize Islam
item.description: The case of a Koran-burning reveals double standards in the English justice system.

item.title: 'Lawless act of defiance': DOJ says Biden judge is refusing to follow Supreme Court order
item.description: Eight illegal immigrants are living in a shipping container on a U.S. military base in the African country of Djibouti after a federal judge this week...

item.title: Illegal Alien Arrested By ICE While Streaming Protest Learns Press Credentials Are Not Citizenship Papers
item.description: They want to make it about his work as a journalist, not his immigration status. But being in the U.S. illegally has consequences.

item.title: New Yorkers Know How to Fix Their City and Have Chosen Not To
item.description: I don’t have questions for the thoroughly absurd Zohran Mamdani. I have questions for New York’s electorate.

item.title: NYC Shows You Can’t Import The Third World Without Importing Its Failed Politics
item.description: Importing a large number of people from nations where liberty does not thrive and making no demand of assimilation doesn't create a melting pot. It cr...

item.title: Trump says nuclear deal with Iran not necessary
item.description: President Trump Wednesday said it was no longer necessary to work out a nuclear deal with Iran, and he said U.S. negotiators will discuss the issue wi...

item.title: NATO chief Rutte grilled by journalists for 'gushing' behavior toward Trump
item.description: NATO Secretary-General Mark Rutte was grilled by reporters Wednesday for being too "gushing" in his praise of President Trump during the alliance's su...

item.title: Trump considers candidates to replace Federal Reserve Chair Powell
item.description: President Trump on Wednesday said he has a handful of people in mind to replace Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell, who has resisted Mr. Trump's c...

item.title: Trump’s New Intelligence Problem
item.description: The ‘deep state’ abides, in a different form.

item.title: Trump says Iranians asked U.S. what time they could bomb American military base in Qatar
item.description: President Trump said Iranian leaders cleared their plan with the U.S. to fire retaliatory strikes against an American airbase in Qatar, and even reque...

item.title: Governor Swaps Three Trustees Amid Rock-Bottom Free Speech Rankings For Indiana University
item.description: 'What is the scandal about a conservative Republican governor appointing conservatives to a position?' James Bopp said.

item.title: Assume Everything Russia Hoaxer And Biden Laptop Truther Natasha Bertrand Says Is A Lie
item.description: Bertrand is a regime mouthpiece who will shamelessly publish anything to smear her political opponents, irrespective of its validity.

item.title: What Government Can and Can’t Do About Birth Rates
item.description: A change in marginal incentives can have salutary effects.

item.title: The New York Times Is Mad Transportation Secretary Duffy Raised A Big, Happy Family
item.description: A happy and successful man became the target of NYT ire simply because he promotes the secret to his endless joy whenever he can.
